title: Terry Pratchett From Good Omens Tribute | Prime Video
author: Amazon Prime Video
comment: Watch Good Omens now exclusively with your Prime Membership: http://bit.ly/GoodOmensPrimeVideo

“Give a man a fire and he's warm for a day, but set fire to him and he's warm for the rest of his life.”
- Terry Pratchett, Jingo.

Anyone else balling their eyes out wishing Terry was alive to see this happen? I REALLY hope there is an afterlife where he's sitting in comfort and enjoying everything that came out of his collaboration with Neil. I also hope he's having fits of laughter at the Christian group trying to get it cancelled from Netflix. (They updated and corrected their petition to get it off Amazon now.)
In tears hearing Neil Gaiman say he couldn’t have the sushi scene without Terry Pratchett 😭
Neil's Terry Pratchett voice is dead on.  I'm not sure he's even conscious of how much he sounds like his friend when he does it.
description:
In this touching video tribute, the cast and executive producers of Good Omens remember Terry Pratchett and honor his legacy as co-author of the book that became the Good Omens show. Watch Good Omens now, only on Amazon Prime.

» Watch Good Omens now exclusively with your Prime Membership:
